Irfan Dizdarević - Project Portfolio

Irfan Dizdarević - Project Portfolio

Key Projects

USAID SEI BiH - Electoral Process Strengthening

Assisted in overseeing financial, operational, and administrative tasks to ensure compliance with USAID and local regulations.

Managed a $750,000 procurement process for 155 voting scanners, coordinating logistics and customs clearance.

Led election day equipment distribution across seven cities.

Organized two major conferences on election technologies and best practices.

Investment Banking - Vakufska Bank

Co-managed a $30M investment fund portfolio, ensuring regulatory compliance.

Executed securities transactions and facilitated share transactions.

Opened a custodial bank account at UniCredit Bank Austria, granting foreign market access.

Business Development - InMotion DOO (Landstar System Inc.)

Secured a major business deal with BJ’s Restaurants, Inc., contributing to over $5M in revenue.

Optimized logistics operations, increasing efficiency and profitability.
